section.title: Energy Commands
section.para: Calculate energies for models and trajectory frames. All printing commands refer to the last energy calculated for either the model or a trajectory frame.

section.title: ecut
section.para: Return (or set and return) the cutoff radius used in calculation of the electrostatics for a system.
For example:
sets the electrostatic cutoff radius to 15.0 Angstroms.

section.title: elec
section.para: Set the style of electrostatic energy calculation to use, either no electrostatics, coulombic (non-periodic) electrostatics, or Ewald-based electrostatics. For the latter, either the various parameters may be defined explicitly (when "ewald" is the chosen method) or may be estimated for the current system by using "ewaldauto".
